© 2022 AerCap  | Confidential property of the company, not for disclosure or use without permissionThe volume of market intelligence gathered in 
any 12- month window gives us unparalleled 
insight to make better decisions which translates into enhanced order book selection
AerCap prides itself on making disciplined capital allocation decisions and this discipline begins with the order book 
Our scale allows us to manage our order book 
to provide unique solutions to complex problems and we have a large enough backlog to meet requirements of both new and existing customers
Our order book consists of over 450 new technology aircraft; the most in demand aircraft in the world
At Aer Cap, we set ourselves the highest 
standards for ethical, social, and environmental responsibility and we expect a similar standard from our suppliersAerCap’s vast experience, scale and deep relationship with the OEMs enhance supplier risk management 
Any decision to order aircraft from the OEMs must be carefully balanced between risk and reward and AerCap has unrivalled ordering experience, having ordered and taken delivery of more aircraft than any other lessor in the industry
